reset_last_completed.name: Reset last completed
reset_last_completed.description: Set a Maint task's last completed date to today or a provided date.

entity_id.name: Task entity
entity_id.description: Binary sensor entity for the Maint task to reset. Use entry_id/task_id instead if the entity is unavailable.

entry_id.name: Entry ID
entry_id.description: Maint config entry ID. Required if entity_id is not provided.

task_id.name: Task ID
task_id.description: Maint task ID. Required if entity_id is not provided.

last_completed.name: Last completed
last_completed.description: Date to store as the last completed value. Defaults to today when omitted.
